name: Alien Invasion (itch) (kc101010)
description:
Alien Invasion is a small and simple game that I created while learning the ropes of the GBDK using C! You'll play as the UFO trying to abduct the Humans!

Please find below a zip folder which holds the game file.

Alien Invasion has been tested on the BGB emulator.

Here are some of the resources that I used;

http://bgb.bircd.org/ (BGB Emulator)
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeEj4c2zF7PaFv5MPYhNAkBGrkx4iPGJo (Extremely helpful tutorial by GamingMonsters)
https://github.com/gingemonster/GameBoyPngConverter(Software which allowed me to implement my splash screen, also created by GamingMonsters)
https://forums.getpaint.net/topic/29424-trs-color-reducer-and-palette-maker-2014...(TechnoRobbo's Color Reducer - a plugin for Paint.net to make images suitable for use with GameBoy)
https://gbdev.gg8.se/wiki/articles/GBDK(GBDK WIKI)

RESOURCES NOT LISTED CAN BE FOUND VIA GamingMonsters GBDK playlist
